name: 2K9CON'S SANDBOX
description:
So.. what's this?

2K9CON's Playground is a sandbox based Unity3D game in which I test myself to create things & learn on the way.

The way I'm adding new ideas/concepts etc is simple, 
if I want to drive a car?
I make a car system, 
want to shoot some birds?
Make shoot system & bird system, 
Want to do this? make That. 

That's the basic idea of how I'm adding things, however, 
one of the rules is every single module has to be able to work together and separately. 
It's a challenge but a fun one!

As far as game development goes programming is by far where I am most advanced, I have done art, textures, and 3D modeling before (Audio too!) but programming has always been my focus point hence the bad models and art design (Don't judge too harsh thanks :D)

CONTROLS

WASD - MOVE
MOUSE 1 - FIRE
MOUSE 2 - AIM
SPACE - JUMP
CTRL - CROUCH
Q & E - LEAN
F - PICKUP
G - DROP
V - DROP (OBJECTS)
ESC - MENU / DEBUG MENU
I = BULLETIME / SLOW MO
